meanings.definition: A group of three people or things.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, a trio of birds sang outside my window.
meanings.sent2: The trio of friends went on a hike together.
meanings.sent3: The trio of colors on the painting created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent4: The trio of flavors in the ice cream cone danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The trio of stars shone brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A musical composition for three voices or instruments.
meanings.sent1: The talented trio performed a beautiful piece at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The trio of musicians practiced diligently for their upcoming show.
meanings.sent3: The trio of notes in the melody intertwined perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The trio of instruments played in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The trio of singers captivated the audience with their voices.
